product_name: Rossignol Comp J3 Ski Boots - Juniors' - 2012/2013
long_description: Rossignol Comp J3 junior ski boots are a great choice for young skiers developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of kids' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to manage. Liners use anatomic, premolded foam to increase warmth and comfort. The Rossignol Comp J3 boots feature 3 buckles, a short cuff height for small legs and a 40 flex index, an easy flex appropriate for junior skiers.
short_description: Rossignol Comp J3 junior ski boots are a great choice for young skiers developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features.
